channel.title: 2020 on Khalid's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2020 on Khalid's Blog

item.title: Emoji in Actions during this 2020 Awkwardness
item.description: These days, a lot of conversations happen and people have many ways to express their feeling whether it’s sad, angry, happy, or even desperation. Emoji is one thing that you could never miss its sighting.
